sentence: there is a boy sitting in front of a bed.
on the bed is folded stacks of clothes.
the boy is reaching out for one of the stacks.
there is a man walking with his back turned to the bed.
he has a laundry basket in his hand.
behind the boy is a large puzzle set half finished.
the boy has a set different set of puzzle pieces on the other side of the bed.
the dresser is on the other side of the room.
the laundry basket still has clothes in it.
